name: tns-ios-inspector
description: Telerik NativeScript Inspector for iOS Runtime

scripts.postinstall: OSVERSION="$(sw_vers -productVersion | grep -o "[0-9][0-9].[0-9][0-9]")"; OSVERSION=${OSVERSION//.}; UNZIP_FILE="NativeScript Inspector Sierra"; if [ $OSVERSION -ge 1013 ]; then UNZIP_FILE="NativeScript Inspector HighSierra"; fi; unzip -o "$UNZIP_FILE" -d .; rm *.zip
